mapper.select: SELECT chq.id, chq.addtime, chq.homework_id, chq.question_id, chq.t_username, eqb.title AS question_name, eqb.options, eqb.score, eqb.answer, eqb.analysis, eqb.type, eqb.sequence, ch.homework AS homework, ut.t_name AS tName, cc.course AS course FROM course_homework_question chq LEFT JOIN exam_question_bank eqb ON chq.question_id = eqb.id LEFT JOIN course_homework ch ON chq.homework_id = ch.id LEFT JOIN user_teacher ut ON chq.t_username = ut.t_username LEFT JOIN course_categories cc ON ch.course = cc.course 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment}
